title: When you make a contradictory thread/comment and you know people responding are triggered as hell

replies.body: I hate when that happens, but it's such a pleasant surprise when the replies are nice and constructive rather than a flood of reee.

> when the replies are nice and constructive

https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/477/329/0ed.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=PaffWasTaken,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AFGZO2gE,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-04-29T03:33:41.441+0000)
>
> https://i.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/477/329/0ed.jpg

Yeah, that's why I sometimes ask my monitor "WHAT DO YOU PEOPLE WANT THIS TIME" when I see I have notifications.
TRIGGERED AS HELL, YOU KNOW WHAT IF THAT'S ALL YOU THINK OF THIS GAME FORUM UR NUTS.
You forgot the the 1 red notification from a moderator who disagrees with you, so they just removed your post instead of an intellectual debate.
My record was 49 LOL. It was about reverting Zac.
When you make a post telling the people who cry about Riven to play her if she's freelo

You know you really fucked up though when the exclamation point notification has at least a 1 next to it.

Still, I related on some level.

> [{quoted}](name=4 Step Cadence,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=AFGZO2gE,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-04-29T04:25:55.560+0000)
>
> You know you really fucked up though when the exclamation point notification has at least a 1 next to it.
> 
> Still, I related on some level.

I got one earlier cuz this guy made a post bitching about matchmaking making him unable to climb, and he had struck in his name. So i was like "more like*whateverthefuckhisnamewas*STUCK, Hah gottem." And the mods took it down. Apparently u arent suppose to go that hard.
Ugh tell me about it though my record’s like 12, so that’s pretty impressive
